statements: SELECT id, name, type, quantity FROM crops WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT name, quantity FROM crops WHERE type = 'vegetable';
SELECT id, name FROM crops WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM crops ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM crops ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE name IN ('Apple', 'Banana', 'Orange');
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE quantity IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE type NOT IN ('fruit', 'vegetable');
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE type = 'fruit' AND quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM crops JOIN farms ON crops.crop_id = farms.farm_id
SELECT * FROM crops JOIN farms ON crops.crop_name = farms.farm_name
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, farm_name, location FROM crops JOIN farms ON crops.crop_id = farms.farm_id
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, farm_name, location FROM crops JOIN farms ON crops.crop_name = farms.farm_name WHERE crop_type='Vegetable'
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM crops WHERE crop_type='Fruit'
SELECT farm_name, location FROM farms WHERE location='California'
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, location FROM crops JOIN farms ON crops.crop_id = farms.farm_id WHERE location='California'
SELECT crop_name, location FROM crops JOIN farms ON crops.crop_id = farms.farm_id WHERE crop_type='Vegetable'
SELECT crop_type, farm_name FROM crops JOIN farms ON crops.crop_id = farms.farm_id WHERE farm_name='Farm A'
SELECT farmers.name, crops.crop_name, harvest.quantity FROM farmers JOIN crops ON farmers.id = crops.farmer_id JOIN harvest ON crops.crop_id = harvest.crop_id
SELECT crops.crop_name, fields.field_name, fields.field_size FROM crops JOIN fields ON crops.crop_id = fields.crop_id

SELECT farmers.name, fields.field_name, harvest.quantity FROM farmers JOIN crops ON farmers.id = crops.farmer_id JOIN fields ON crops.crop_id = fields.crop_id JOIN harvest ON crops.crop_id = harvest.crop_id
SELECT farmers.name, round(avg(harvest.quantity), 2) as avg_quantity FROM farmers JOIN crops ON farmers.id = crops.farmer_id JOIN harvest ON crops.crop_id = harvest.crop_id GROUP BY farmers.id
SELECT crop_type, sum(quantity) as total_quantity FROM crops JOIN harvest ON crops.crop_id = harvest.crop_id GROUP BY crop_type
SELECT crops.crop_name, sum(harvest.quantity) as total_quantity FROM crops JOIN harvest ON crops.crop_id = harvest.crop_id GROUP BY crops.crop_name
SELECT farmers.name, count(*) as num_crops FROM farmers JOIN crops ON farmers.id = crops.farmer_id GROUP BY farmers.name
SELECT crops.crop_name, max(harvest.quantity) as max_quantity FROM crops JOIN harvest ON crops.crop_id = harvest.crop_id GROUP BY crops.crop_name
SELECT farmer_id, count(*) as num_crops FROM crops GROUP BY farmer_id
SELECT harvest_date, sum(quantity) as total_quantity FROM harvest GROUP BY harvest_date
SELECT DISTINCT(farmers.id) as unique_farmer_ids FROM farmers
SELECT name, age, gender FROM farmer
SELECT farm.id, field.size FROM farm JOIN field ON farm.id = field.farm_id
SELECT crop.name, field.soil_type FROM crop JOIN field ON crop.id = field.id
SELECT farmer.name, farm.location FROM farmer JOIN farm ON farmer.id = farm.id
SELECT farm.name, machinery.type FROM farm JOIN machinery ON farm.id = machinery.id
SELECT farmer.name, crop.type FROM farmer JOIN crop ON farmer.id = crop.id
